headline: LOWE'S COMPANIES, INC. DECLARES CASH DIVIDEND
summary: The board of directors of Lowe's Companies, Inc. (NYSE: LOW) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of one dollar and 20 cents ($1.20) per share, payable Nov. 5, 2025, to shareholders of record as of Oct. 22, 2025.

headline: Why This 1 Value Stock Could Be a Great Addition to Your Portfolio

headline: Earnings live: Affirm swings to profit, Alibaba stock rises, Dell slides, Marvell tanks
summary: The gush of second quarter earnings reports is beginning to slow to a trickle, and with most of the reports in, the results have been mostly positive.
